root: ^It says something about a "vanishing spell"? I must've been right! It has to be the missing page from that magic book we saw!

^Oh wait, it says this spell doesn't actually make things vanish, it just makes the object/person that you're trying to make disappear teleport anywhere from a couple of miles away to hundreds of miles away.
^Pff, those witches & wizards haven't came up with a way to make things actually vanish?
^You don't think someone used this spell on the bees, right?

c-0: ^But why! Those poor bees, I hope they're all together and not on their own somewhere.
c-1: ^Surely! What good would that do? But why did they rip it up and try to put it in the bin?
